pr_title: KEYCLOAK-14235 Support for running broker tests with different hostnames for auth server and IdP

timeline.message: KEYCLOAK-14235 Support for running broker tests with different hostnames for auth server and IdP

timeline.bodyText: I'm not sure if this is intended behavior. @mposolda Could you please double check this?
timeline.author: vmuzikar

replies.bodyText: @vmuzikar Yes, this is expected behaviour. IMO this change is fine
replies.author: mposolda
